metadata.Name: Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD)
metadata.Description: A French native expert-annotated statutory article retrieval dataset consisting of over 1,100 legal questions labeled with relevant articles from a corpus of 22,600+ Belgian law articles.
metadata.Paper Title: A Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset in French
metadata.Abstract: Statutory article retrieval is the task of automatically retrieving law articles relevant to a legal question. To address the scarcity of large-scale and high-quality annotated datasets, we introduce the Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD), which consists of 1,100+ French native legal questions labeled by experienced jurists with relevant articles from a corpus of 22,600+ Belgian law articles. We benchmark several state-of-the-art retrieval approaches and find that fine-tuned dense retrieval models significantly outperform other systems. Our dataset and source code are publicly available.
